summary: Two strangers awaken in a room with no recollection of how they got there, and soon discover they're pawns in a deadly game perpetrated by a notorious serial killer.
cast: Leigh Whannell|Cary Elwes|Danny Glover|Ken Leung|Dina Meyer|Mike Butters|Paul Gutrecht|Michael Emerson|Benito Martinez|Shawnee Smith|Makenzie Vega|Monica Potter|Ned Bellamy|Alexandra Bokyun Chun|Avner Garbi|Tobin Bell|Oren Koules|Hans Raith
keywords: locked in a room|trapped in a room|mind game|surprise ending|flashback
title: Saw
